00033 Goal::Goal(Goal const &other)
00034   :Predicate(other), m_start(other.m_start), 
00035    m_duration(other.m_duration), m_end(other.m_end) {}

00037 Goal::Goal(Symbol const &object, Symbol const &pred)
00038   :Predicate(object, pred), m_start(s_startName, s_dateDomain), 
00039    m_duration(s_durationName, s_durationDomain), 
00040    m_end(s_endName, s_dateDomain) {}
00041 
00042 Goal::Goal(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node)
00043   :Predicate(node), m_start(s_startName, s_dateDomain), 
00044    m_duration(s_durationName, s_durationDomain), 
00045    m_end(s_endName, s_dateDomain) {
00046   iterator iStart = find(s_startName), 
00047     iDuration, iEnd;
00048   iterator const endi = end();
00049   IntegerDomain dStart(s_dateDomain), dDuration(s_durationDomain),
00050     dEnd(s_dateDomain);
00051   if( endi!=iStart ) {
00052     try {
00053       dStart.restrictWith(iStart->second.domain());
00054     } catch( EmptyDomain const &e ) {
00055       throw PredicateException(std::string("Goal: start domain : ")+e.what());
00056     }
00057     remove(iStart);
00058   }
00059   iDuration = find(s_durationName);
00060   if( endi!=iDuration ) {
00061     try {
00062       dDuration.restrictWith(iDuration->second.domain());
00063     } catch( EmptyDomain const &e ) {
00064       throw PredicateException(std::string("Goal: duration domain : ")+e.what());
00065     }
00066     remove(iDuration);
00067   }
00068   iEnd = find(s_endName);
00069   if( endi!=iEnd ) {
00070     try {
00071       dEnd.restrictWith(iEnd->second.domain());
00072     } catch( EmptyDomain const &e ) {
00073       throw PredicateException(std::string("Goal: end domain : ")+e.what());
00074     }
00075     remove(iEnd);
00076   }
00077   restrictTime(dStart, dDuration, dEnd);
00078 }

00080 // Modifiers :
00081 
00082 void Goal::restrictAttribute(Variable const &var) {
00083   Symbol const &id = var.name();
00084   // Handle specific temporal attributes
00085   if( s_startName==id )
00086     restrictStart(var.typedDomain<IntegerDomain>());
00087   else if( s_durationName==id ) 
00088     restrictDuration(var.typedDomain<IntegerDomain>());
00089   else if( s_durationName==id ) 
00090     restrictEnd(var.typedDomain<IntegerDomain>());
00091   else 
00092     Predicate::restrictAttribute(var);
00093 }
00094 
00095 void Goal::restrictTime(IntegerDomain const &s,
00096                      IntegerDomain const &d,
00097                      IntegerDomain const &e) {
00098   IntegerDomain::bound sLo, sHi, dLo, dHi, eLo, eHi;
00099   IntegerDomain::bound mLo, mHi, aLo, aHi;
00100 
00101   if( !( m_start.domain().intersect(s) && 
00102         m_duration.domain().intersect(d) &&
00103         m_end.domain().intersect(e) ) )
00104     throw PredicateException("Invalid time constraint on Goal");
00105   // Compute the new domains
00106   m_start.typedDomain<IntegerDomain>().getBounds(sLo, sHi);
00107   
00108   s.getBounds(aLo, aHi);
00109   // s = s inter start
00110   sLo = sLo.max(aLo);
00111   sHi = sHi.min(aHi);
00112 
00113   m_duration.typedDomain<IntegerDomain>().getBounds(dLo, dHi);
00114   d.getBounds(aLo, aHi);
00115   // d = d inter duration 
00116   dLo = dLo.max(aLo);
00117   dHi = dHi.min(aHi);
00118 
00119   m_end.typedDomain<IntegerDomain>().getBounds(eLo, eHi);
00120   e.getBounds(aLo, aHi);
00121   // e = e inter end
00122   eLo = eLo.max(aLo);
00123   eHi = eHi.min(aHi);
00124  
00125   // propagate end time 
00126   // e = e inter s+d
00127   eHi = eHi.min(sHi.plus(dHi, eHi));
00128   eLo = eLo.max(sLo.plus(dLo, eLo));
00129 
00130   if( eLo>eHi )
00131     throw PredicateException("end time is empty after propagation");
00132 
00133   // propagate start time 
00134   // s = s inter e-d
00135   sHi = sHi.min(eHi.minus(dLo, sHi));
00136   sLo = sLo.max(eLo.minus(dHi, sLo));
00137 
00138   if( sLo>sHi )
00139     throw PredicateException("start time is empty after propagation");
00140 
00141   // propagate duration 
00142   // d = d inter e-s
00143   dHi = dHi.min(eHi.minus(sLo, dHi));
00144   dLo = dLo.max(eLo.minus(sHi, dLo));
00145 
00146   if( dLo>dHi )
00147     throw PredicateException("duration is empty after propagation");
00148   try {
00149     // start = start inter s
00150     m_start.restrict(IntegerDomain(sLo, sHi));
00151   } catch( EmptyDomain const &e) {
00152     // this should not happen
00153     throw PredicateException(std::string("Goal: start progation: ")+e.what());
00154   }
00155   try {
00156     // duration = duration inter d
00157     m_duration.restrict(IntegerDomain(dLo, dHi));
00158   } catch( EmptyDomain const &e) {
00159     // this should not happen
00160     throw PredicateException(std::string("Goal: duration progation: ")+e.what());
00161   }
00162   try {
00163     // end = end inter e
00164     m_end.restrict(IntegerDomain(eLo, eHi));
00165   } catch( EmptyDomain const &e) {
00166     // this should not happen
00167     throw PredicateException(std::string("Goal: end progation: ")+e.what());
00168   }
00169 }
00170 
00171 bool Goal::startsAfter(TICK date, TICK delay) {
00172   IntegerDomain test_window(date+delay, IntegerDomain::plus_inf),
00173     cstr_window(date, IntegerDomain::plus_inf);
00174   if( m_start.typedDomain<IntegerDomain>().intersect(test_window) ) {
00175     restrictTime(cstr_window, s_durationDomain, s_dateDomain);
00176     return true;
00177   }
00178   return false;
00179 }

00183 Variable const &Goal::getAttribute(Symbol const &name) const {
00184   if( s_startName==name )
00185     return m_start;
00186   else if( s_durationName==name ) 
00187     return m_duration;
00188   else if( s_endName==name ) 
00189     return m_end;
00190   else 
00191     return Predicate::getAttribute(name);
00192 }

00206 
00207 void Goal::listAttributes(std::list<TREX::utils::Symbol> &attr,
00208                        bool all) const {
00209   if( all || !m_start.domain().isFull() )
00210     attr.push_back(s_startName);
00211   if( all || !m_duration.domain().equals(s_durationDomain) )
00212     attr.push_back(s_durationName);
00213   if( all || !m_end.domain().isFull() )
00214     attr.push_back(s_endName);
00215   Predicate::listAttributes(attr, all);
00216 }
